title: #Amazing 3 bed/ 2 bath house in Rosemead#
posting_body: Amazing 3 bed/ 2 bath house in Rosemead.
Centrally located between multiple freeways and shopping centers.
Excellent neighborhood with ample of parking (no parking permit required for overnight).

Amenities included: central air, central heat, updated kitchen, updated bathroom, washer dryer hook-up, 240v outlet available for electric vehicle, private backyard, and laminate and tile floors throughout, fenced-in front yard, enclosed patio, storage shed, minimal landscaping.
